title: Auto-merge social media PRs (Discord, Instagram, highlights, README)
author: Itachi-1824

gist.headline: The bots are taking over (the paperwork)
gist.blurb: Routine social updates now merge themselves. Less clicking, more coding.
gist.summary: Enabled auto-merge for Instagram, GitHub Highlights, and README update workflows to streamline content publishing.
gist.impact: Eliminates manual review steps for routine social posts while maintaining a PR audit trail.
gist.visual_concept: A conveyor belt of news being stamped automatically. The bee is supervising the automation.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a conveyor belt moving pixelated newspapers. A mechanical stamper marks them 'MERGED'. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel gradient background. The pollinations.ai bee mascot watches happily with a clipboard. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Nostalgic but beautiful.

image.prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a cute automated conveyor belt sorting colorful pixel letters. Soft lime green (#ecf874) and pastel peach gradient background. The pollinations.ai bee watches the smooth process. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi aesthetic. Organized and efficient.
